TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine2 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine

summary.span: 此接口将扩展 IBuildEngine，提供一个允许并行生成项目文件的方法。

span.span: This interface extends IBuildEngine to provide a method allowing building project files in parallel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展 ，使你能够在包含多个处理器的系统上并行生成多个项目文件，或在具有多个内核的处理器上并行生成多个 extends , allowing you to build multiple project files in parallel on systems containing multiple processors, or processors with multiple cores.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool BuildProjectFile (string projectFileName, string[] targetNames, System.Collections.IDictionary globalProperties, System.Collections.IDictionary targetOutputs, string toolsVersion);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool BuildProjectFile(string projectFileName, string[] targetNames, class System.Collections.IDictionary globalProperties, class System.Collections.IDictionary targetOutputs, string toolsVersion) cil managed
Public Function BuildProjectFile (projectFileName As String, targetNames As String(), globalProperties As IDictionary, targetOutputs As IDictionary, toolsVersion As String) As Boolean

public: bool BuildProjectFile(System::String ^ projectFileName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ targetNames, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ globalProperties, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ targetOutputs, System::String ^ toolsVersion);
abstract member BuildProjectFile : string * string[] * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary * string -> bool

span.span: The project to build.

param.name: targetNames
param.span: 要生成的项目中的目标（可以为 null）。

span.span: The targets in the project to build (can be null).

param.name: globalProperties
param.span: 要应用于子项目的其他全局属性的哈希表 (可以为 null) 。

span.span: A hash table of additional global properties to apply to the child project (can be null).
The key and value should both be strings.

param.name: targetOutputs
param.span: 每个指定目标 (的输出可以为 null) 。

span.span: The outputs of each specified target (can be null).

param.name: toolsVersion
param.span: 引擎所识别的工具版本，将在此生成期间使用（可以为 null）。

span.span: A tools version recognized by the Engine that will be used during this build (can be null).

summary.span: 此方法允许任务启动对特定项目文件的生成。

span.span: This method allows tasks to initiate a build on a particular project file.

summary.span: 如果生成成功，则在返回指定目标的任何) (输出。

span.span: If the build is successful, the outputs (if any) of the specified targets are returned.

returns.span: 如果生成成功，则为 true

span.span: true, if build was successful

remarks.span: 1) 可接受同时为 targetNames 和 targetOutputs 2 传递 null) 如果未指定任何目标，则会将默认目标作为三个) 目标输出返回为按目标名称编制索引的 ITaskItem 数组

span.span: 1) it is acceptable to pass null for both targetNames and targetOutputs 2) if no targets are specified, the default targets are built 3) target outputs are returned as ITaskItem arrays indexed by target name

span.span: The project to build.

param.name: targetNames
param.span: 要生成的项目中的目标（可以为 null）。

span.span: The targets in the project to build (can be null).

param.name: globalProperties
param.span: 要应用于子项目的其他全局属性的哈希表数组， (数组项可以为 null) 。

span.span: An array of hashtables of additional global properties to apply to the child project (array entries can be null).

param.span: 哈希表中的键和值都应为字符串。

span.span: The key and value in the hashtable should both be strings.

param.name: targetOutputsPerProject
param.span: 每个指定目标 (的输出可以为 null) 。

span.span: The outputs of each specified target (can be null).

param.name: toolsVersion
param.span: 引擎所识别的工具版本，将在此生成期间使用（可以为 null）。

span.span: A tools version recognized by the Engine that will be used during this build (can be null).

param.name: useResultsCache
param.span: 如果为 true，则仅当缓存尚未包含结果时才会运行操作。

span.span: If true the operation will only be run if the cache doesn't already contain the result.

param.span: 完成操作后，结果将存储在缓存中

span.span: After the operation the result is stored in the cache

param.name: unloadProjectsOnCompletion
param.span: 如果为 true，则在操作完成后，将立即卸载项目

span.span: If true the project will be unloaded once the operation is completed

span.span: If the build is successful, the outputs (if any) of the specified targets are returned.

returns.span: 如果生成成功，则为 true

span.span: true, if build was successful

remarks.span: 1) 可接受同时为 targetNames 和 targetOutputs 2 传递 null) 如果未指定任何目标，则会将默认目标作为三个) 目标输出返回为按目标名称编制索引的 ITaskItem 数组

span.span: 1) it is acceptable to pass null for both targetNames and targetOutputs 2) if no targets are specified, the default targets are built 3) target outputs are returned as ITaskItem arrays indexed by target name

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRunningMultipleNodes As Boolean
public: property bool IsRunningMultipleNodes { bool get(); };

summary.span: 此属性允许任务查询系统是在单进程模式下运行还是在多进程模式下运行。

span.span: This property allows a task to query whether or not the system is running in single process mode or multi process mode.

summary.span: 单进程模式 (IsRunningMultipleNodes = false) 是指用 cpu 数 = 1 初始化引擎，而引擎不是子引擎的位置。

span.span: Single process mode (IsRunningMultipleNodes = false) is where the engine is initialized with the number of cpus = 1 and the engine is not a child engine.

summary.span: 当使用多个 cpu 1 初始化引擎 > 或引擎为子引擎时，该引擎处于多进程模式 (IsRunningMultipleNodes = true) 。

span.span: The engine is in multi process mode (IsRunningMultipleNodes = true) when the engine is initialized with a number of cpus > 1 or the engine is a child engine.

value.span: 如果系统在多处理器模式下运行，则返回 ，否则返回 。

span.span: if the system is running in multi-processor mode, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成引擎处于单处理器模式下 (在 `IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false` 使用等于1的 cpu 数进行初始化并且生成引擎不是子引擎时) 。The build engine is in single-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) when it is initialized with the number of CPUs equal to 1 and the build engine is not a child engine. 生成引擎处于多处理器模式下 (在 `IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true` 使用大于1的 cpu 数进行初始化时，或者在生成引擎为子引擎时) 。The build engine is in multi-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) when it is initialized with a number of CPUs greater than 1, or when the build engine is a child engine.
